mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.shouru_uuid_number as shouruUuidNumber ,a.shouru_name as shouruName ,a.shouru_types as shouruTypes ,a.shouru_number as shouruNumber ,a.shangjia_content as shangjiaContent ,a.shoru_time as shoruTime ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail
FROM shouru a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.shouru_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.shouruUuidNumber},'%')
and a.shouru_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.shouruName},'%')
and a.shouru_types = #{params.shouruTypes}
and a.shouru_number >= #{params.shouruNumberStart}
and a.shouru_number <= #{params.shouruNumberEnd}
and a.shangjia_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.shangjiaContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.shoru_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.shoruTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.shoru_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.shoruTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
